message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $17000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product to you, but I am only able to pay up to $15000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $15000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $16000? That's a fair compromise considering the value we both place on this product.
